sqlMap.update:
MERGE INTO PSNL0113 USING DUAL ON (DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey#) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET REVN_DT= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr#
, STTUR=#sttur# , WEI=#wei# , TNKEE_VSN_LF=#tnkeeVsnLf# , TNKEE_VSN_RGHT=#tnkeeVsnRght# , CORR_VSN_LF=#corrVsnLf# , CORR_VSN_RGHT=#corrVsnRght# , PRMTSA_YN=#prmtsaYn# , BLDTP_DIV_CD=#bldtpDivCd# , RELN_FRM_CD=#relnFrmCd# , HBBY_CTNT=#hbbyCtnt# , SPITY_CTNT=#spityCtnt# , DABTY_DIV_CD=#dabtyDivCd# , DABTY_GRDE_CD=#dabtyGrdeCd# , DABTY_AJMT_DT=#dabtyAjmtDt# , PATT_VETNS_DIV_CD=#pattVetnsDivCd# , PATT_VETNS_NUM=#pattVetnsNum# , PATT_VETNS_YN= NVL(#pattVetnsYn#,'N') , AMOM_RELA_DIV_CD=#amomRelaDivCd# , HLTH_CODTN_CTNT=#hlthCodtnCtnt# , HUS_DIV_CD=#husDivCd# , HUS_SUM=#husSum# , RST_PPTY_SUM=#rstPptySum# , MVASST_SUM=#mvasstSum# , RIDN_DIV_CD=#ridnDivCd# , FAMY_ALLW_APPTN_YR_MNTH=#famyAllwApptnYrMnth# , HLTH_INSR_REGRST_FLAG=#hlthInsrRegrstFlag# , NAT_PENN_REGRST_FLAG=#natPennRegrstFlag# , IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_REGRST_FLAG=#idtlAccdtInsurRegrstFlag# , UMYT_INSR_REGRST_FLAG=#umytInsrRegrstFlag# WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , STTUR , WEI , TNKEE_VSN_LF , TNKEE_VSN_RGHT , CORR_VSN_LF , CORR_VSN_RGHT , PRMTSA_YN , BLDTP_DIV_CD , RELN_FRM_CD , HBBY_CTNT , SPITY_CTNT , DABTY_DIV_CD , DABTY_GRDE_CD , DABTY_AJMT_DT , PATT_VETNS_DIV_CD , PATT_VETNS_NUM , PATT_VETNS_YN , AMOM_RELA_DIV_CD , HLTH_CODTN_CTNT , HUS_DIV_CD , HUS_SUM , RST_PPTY_SUM , MVASST_SUM , RIDN_DIV_CD , FAMY_ALLW_APPTN_YR_MNTH , HLTH_INSR_REGRST_FLAG , NAT_PENN_REGRST_FLAG , IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_REGRST_FLAG , UMYT_INSR_REGRST_FLAG , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #systemkey# , #sttur# , #wei# , #tnkeeVsnLf# , #tnkeeVsnRght# , #corrVsnLf# , #corrVsnRght# , #prmtsaYn# , #bldtpDivCd# , #relnFrmCd# , #hbbyCtnt# , #spityCtnt# , #dabtyDivCd# , #dabtyGrdeCd# , #dabtyAjmtDt# , #pattVetnsDivCd# , #pattVetnsNum# , #pattVetnsYn# , #amomRelaDivCd# , #hlthCodtnCtnt# , #husDivCd# , #husSum# , #rstPptySum# , #mvasstSum# , #ridnDivCd# , #famyAllwApptnYrMnth# , #hlthInsrRegrstFlag# , #natPennRegrstFlag# , #idtlAccdtInsurRegrstFlag# , #umytInsrRegrstFlag# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PSNL0113 ( DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , STTUR , WEI , TNKEE_VSN_LF , TNKEE_VSN_RGHT , CORR_VSN_LF , CORR_VSN_RGHT , PRMTSA_YN , BLDTP_DIV_CD , RELN_FRM_CD , HBBY_CTNT , SPITY_CTNT , DABTY_DIV_CD , DABTY_GRDE_CD , DABTY_AJMT_DT , PATT_VETNS_DIV_CD , PATT_VETNS_NUM , PATT_VETNS_YN , AMOM_RELA_DIV_CD , HLTH_CODTN_CTNT , HUS_DIV_CD , HUS_SUM , RST_PPTY_SUM , MVASST_SUM , RIDN_DIV_CD , FAMY_ALLW_APPTN_YR_MNTH , HLTH_INSR_REGRST_FLAG , NAT_PENN_REGRST_FLAG , IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_REGRST_FLAG , UMYT_INSR_REGRST_FLAG , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #systemkey# , #sttur# , #wei# , #tnkeeVsnLf# , #tnkeeVsnRght# , #corrVsnLf# , #corrVsnRght# , #prmtsaYn# , #bldtpDivCd# , #relnFrmCd# , #hbbyCtnt# , #spityCtnt# , #dabtyDivCd# , #dabtyGrdeCd# , #dabtyAjmtDt# , #pattVetnsDivCd# , #pattVetnsNum# , #pattVetnsYn# , #amomRelaDivCd# , #hlthCodtnCtnt# , #husDivCd# , #husSum# , #rstPptySum# , #mvasstSum# , #ridnDivCd# , #famyAllwApptnYrMnth# , #hlthInsrRegrstFlag# , #natPennRegrstFlag# , #idtlAccdtInsurRegrstFlag# , #umytInsrRegrstFlag# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PSNL0113 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , STTUR=#sttur# , WEI=#wei# , TNKEE_VSN_LF=#tnkeeVsnLf# , TNKEE_VSN_RGHT=#tnkeeVsnRght# , CORR_VSN_LF=#corrVsnLf# , CORR_VSN_RGHT=#corrVsnRght# , PRMTSA_YN=#prmtsaYn# , BLDTP_DIV_CD=#bldtpDivCd# , RELN_FRM_CD=#relnFrmCd# , HBBY_CTNT=#hbbyCtnt# , SPITY_CTNT=#spityCtnt# , DABTY_DIV_CD=#dabtyDivCd# , DABTY_GRDE_CD=#dabtyGrdeCd# , DABTY_AJMT_DT=#dabtyAjmtDt# , PATT_VETNS_DIV_CD=#pattVetnsDivCd# , PATT_VETNS_NUM=#pattVetnsNum# , PATT_VETNS_YN=#pattVetnsYn# , AMOM_RELA_DIV_CD=#amomRelaDivCd# , HLTH_CODTN_CTNT=#hlthCodtnCtnt# , HUS_DIV_CD=#husDivCd# , HUS_SUM=#husSum# , RST_PPTY_SUM=#rstPptySum# , MVASST_SUM=#mvasstSum# , RIDN_DIV_CD=#ridnDivCd# , FAMY_ALLW_APPTN_YR_MNTH=#famyAllwApptnYrMnth# , HLTH_INSR_REGRST_FLAG=#hlthInsrRegrstFlag# , NAT_PENN_REGRST_FLAG=#natPennRegrstFlag# , IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_REGRST_FLAG=#idtlAccdtInsurRegrstFlag# , UMYT_INSR_REGRST_FLAG=#umytInsrRegrstFlag# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , STTUR , WEI , TNKEE_VSN_LF , TNKEE_VSN_RGHT , CORR_VSN_LF , CORR_VSN_RGHT , PRMTSA_YN , BLDTP_DIV_CD , RELN_FRM_CD , HBBY_CTNT , SPITY_CTNT , DABTY_DIV_CD , DABTY_GRDE_CD , DABTY_AJMT_DT , PATT_VETNS_DIV_CD , PATT_VETNS_NUM , PATT_VETNS_YN , AMOM_RELA_DIV_CD , HLTH_CODTN_CTNT , HUS_DIV_CD , HUS_SUM , RST_PPTY_SUM , MVASST_SUM , RIDN_DIV_CD , FAMY_ALLW_APPTN_YR_MNTH , HLTH_INSR_REGRST_FLAG , NAT_PENN_REGRST_FLAG , IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_REGRST_FLAG , UMYT_INSR_REGRST_FLAG , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PSNL0113 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey#
